title: Methods
message:
Method
A property that contains a function definition.

WHY use?
To share behaviors in instances of the same data type.

Push - adds to the end of array

Pop - removes last item in the array

Shift - removes first item in the array

join
 joins elemeints in arrays not string
 
 .Split splits the values 
 
 has own property - returns boolean indicating presence of argument
